title: Unable to even log in... OCE
body:
Can't even log in to League at the moment. Login status is just stuck at authenticating forever. Tried the legacy client which let me log in but not queue up or play bots.

Maybe linked to the current thing where players are disconnecting from the game?


If anybody has some fixes that'd be great.

replies.body: i just logged in after trying 4 times, chat took a minute to load. in queue now.
